name: Happy Polluting Time
description:
I made this game based off of the cover art for The Music Machine for the atari 2600.

Hold the C key to move the children left and right. When they reach one of the piles, they'll gather the creatures favorite things and throw them into the machine!

Then, mash the X key to increase the amount of waste the machine will spew out.

The creatures will try to clean up their home, but you will show them their efforts are futile! 

Now pollute, my children! Take all they love and replace it with garbage!
